subject: Re: Community Draft Page
preview: Hi Chrystal,  Yes, the section looks great, unless you have images for the committee observers, we could add them like the Meet out member tile.   We have updated Get in touch and Meet our members hea

full_threads.body:
Hi Chrystal,

Yes, the section looks great, unless you have images for the committee observers, we could add them like the Meet out member tile.

We have updated Get in touch and Meet our members headings.

Thanks Joel. That looks better. Is this how you would set this section of text out if it was your site?

The headings Get in Touch and Meet Our Members are not centred either despite being selected in the settings.


Chrystal Goodhand
Community Liasion Officer

M 0419861712E cgoodhand@murrayzircon.com.au
W http://www.murrayzircon.com.au/


We wish to acknowledge the traditional custodians of this land and their Elders past, present and emerging. In particular those of the River Murray Mallee Aboriginal People and Kaurna, on whose land we share and operate.
We acknowledge and respect their continuing culture and the contribution they make to the life of this city and this region

IMPORTANT: The contents of this email and any attachments are confidential. They are intended for the named recipient(s) only. If you have received this email by mistake, please notify the sender immediately and do not disclose the contents to anyone or make copies thereof.

Hi Chrystal,

Sure, we have adjusted the text widget.
https://murrayzircon.com.au/community-draft/

Thank you.

I added a text widget underneath the 'Meet the Members' section. Is this the best layout to use? It looks a bit lost with the gap above it. I wondered if you had a better suggestion?


Chrystal Goodhand
Community Liasion Officer

M 0419861712E cgoodhand@murrayzircon.com.au
W http://www.murrayzircon.com.au/

Hi Chrystal,

Sure, we have adjusted the slideshow height.

Thanks Joel. We didn't want the slide show so tall, I did play with this already. Any other options?


Chrystal Goodhand
Community Liasion Officer

M 0419861712E cgoodhand@murrayzircon.com.au
W http://www.murrayzircon.com.au/

Hi Chrystal,

We have updated the page. Please see below:
https://murrayzircon.com.au/community-draft/

  • "Murray Mallee Community Consultative Committee" text is now centered
  • Slideshow image has been fixed, we have manually adjusted the images
  • Unfortunately there isn't an option to randomly change the slide show.

Thank you Joel

The solution to the Agenda and Minutes you mentioned is perfect.

I have attached the form for you to manually upload.

Thank you for the video.

I cannot get the heading to centre (see attached screen shot). I have selected the centre option but it is not centering.

On our slideshow, is there a way to zoom out on the picture. The one that says 'Proud sponsor of Nippy's Loxton Gift Carnival' has some heads cut off. It may just be that the photo won't fit.

Is there an option for random selection of the slide that will show when the page is first clicked on? It would be good if a different slide showed each time.

Kind Regards

Chrystal


Chrystal Goodhand
Community Liasion Officer

M 0419861712E cgoodhand@murrayzircon.com.au
W http://www.murrayzircon.com.au/

Hi Chrystal,

We are working on this one.

  1. Done, whenever you add a new agenda/Minutes it will automatically be at the top of the list.
  2. Can you send the pdf file and we will manually upload it? the site is converting the pdf so we need to do this manually.
  3. Here is a quick video on how to add new members. https://www.loom.com/share/da43778ab1db4eb8a45dc86132b73fc0

Let me know if this works for you?

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia ran the **Needs Joel's assistance** workflow
Workflows ran the **Needs Joel's assistance** workflow

full_threads.body: Hi @joel need your help with this ticket. Thanks!

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia

full_threads.body:
Hello all

Just in need of some assistance with a couple of things with this page please if possible. www.murrayzircon.com.au/community-draft

  1. I want to put the Agenda and Minute documents in date order from the most recent to least recent. The Minute documents are in the correct order (not sure how I did this). I attempted to drag and drop the Agenda documents in 'Edit with Elementor' but this did not work. What is the solution please?
  2. I have uploaded out Community Sponsorship Request Form to the relevant green button on the page - this form is a fillable PDF. When I click on it to open, it is no longer fillable? Can you help with this please?
  3. The 'Meet Our Members' Section. How do I add more Members please?

Kind Regards
Chrystal


Chrystal Goodhand
Community Liasion Officer

M 0419861712
E cgoodhand@murrayzircon.com.au
W www.murrayzircon.com.au
